A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is a satisfying entertainment experience\, albeit one that comes at a price. There is little in the form of answers to questions from The Force Awakens and the plot is strikingly dull. That being said\, there are intriguing elements such as Rey's journeys on Luke's planet and the snowy scene with Luke and Kylo. This was good\, but I sincerely hope that the next movie answers questions and deals with plot sequences better\, rather than forcing us into strange situations.
